creator: calestyo@scientia.net
text:
Hi.

It seems there are the modes "shmcb" and "shmht" for SSLSessionCache which are however not documented at all.

Could you please add this? Thx :)


Cheers,
Chris.

creator: nick@webthing.com
text:
The real fix here is to chop out the description of options there, and link to mod_socache documentation instead.

The real bug is the lack of mod_socache docs.

creator: humbedooh@apache.org
text: I see that "shmcb" seems to be documented now, and "shmht" does not exist anywhere that I can see. Can we close this ticket, or does more work need to be done?

creator: calestyo@scientia.net
text:
shmcb is documented now, right :)

I can't find shmht in the current sources, too, but google for it, at least it was available,... not sure whether it was dropped or whether it's just passed to SSL and is therefore not found in the code.

creator: humbedooh@apache.org
text:
It appars that shmcb is documented now, and shmht has been removed long ago, ( https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=17876 ).
I am marking this ticket as resolved. Feel free to reopen if you feel otherwise.
